email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 03/21/2001 11:15 AM --------------------------- "Zerilli, Frank" <fzerilli@POWERMERCHANTS.COM> on 03/21/2001 10:59:27 AM To: "Eric Carlstrom (E-mail)" <Eric_Carlstrom@ars.aon.com>, "Guardian, The (E-mail)" <RVotruba@EliasPress.com>, "John Arnold (E-mail)" <jarnold@enron.com>, "Stacey Hoey (E-mail)" <sahoey@optonline.net>, "Lew Williams (E-mail 2)" <bak2texas@msn.com> cc: "'sharonzerilli@yahoo.com'" <sharonzerilli@yahoo.com>, "'mzerilli@optonline.net'" <mzerilli@optonline.net> Subject: From a recent milk carton ----- > > A little lost girl has recently been found. Her name is Jessica. She does > not know who her daddy is or where she last saw her mom. Please take a > look > and see if you recognize her so that we might locate her parents. > > > - C.DTF
